website_summaries.verdict: High-quality freeze-dried chicken treats that your cat will go crazy over.
pros: Features human grade, white meat, cage-free chicken breast packaged in the U.S. No preservatives
Available in 3 different sizes of treats – regular, littles, and sprinkles
cons: Treats are pricey and can get crushed into dust in transit

customer_reviews.title: Cats love them, but too much dust!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE these treats, however, the item is always shipped in a bubble mailer, so the delicate treats are pulverized in the process. The last 5oz bag I got was mostly dust, with just a handful of actual treats left. There was dust, then tiny treat fragments, then the actual treats. Very frustrating, especially since these treats are pricey. I end up having to sift out the dust with each package. The cats are happy with that sprinkled on their food, but it's not really a treat/reward at that point.
customer_reviews.author: Mmlissa

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised - contains ASH
customer_reviews.text: This product contains ash - so the false advertising of "one ingredient" is not true. I spoke to the owner of this company & he told me his supplier for this product said ash was normal in chicken & fish. Not true. Ash is not a mineral & cannot be filtered by the kidneys. HALO has a truly what they say it is chicken treat. (I spoke to them also.. no ash)
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: Sourced?
customer_reviews.text: My cats love freeze dried chicken treats in general, this brand included. The pieces are usually fairly big, though there is some dust in the bottom, I think that's probably to be expected. They seem fresh enough according to my cats, of course. I contacted Cat-Man-Doo to inquire about the origins of the chicken, specifically where it sourced from, and received no response. Thus I won't be purchasing this particular brand again.
customer_reviews.author: NickHNC

customer_reviews.title: Very Popular in Our House
customer_reviews.text: Our cats go crazy for the Cat-Man-Doo Freeze Dried Chicken. We've purchased other brands of freeze-dried chicken with very mixed results in the past, but this brand is a HUGE hit and now is the only kind we buy. Easy to break off into small bites and is a high reward treat. Our dog likes it too, but for picky cats, finding a treat they love this much is a rarity.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: All it is, is dehydrated chicken. My cat ...
customer_reviews.text: All it is, is dehydrated chicken. My cat has literally chewed the bag to get to the treats. I had to place it up on a very high shelf for him not to try to get it. To give my cat some extra water I filled a small shallow bowl with about two tablespoons of water and broken up one large piece to soak up the liquid and my cat licked the bowl dry. I will definitely be purchasing this product again.
customer_reviews.author: artnscience

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this product. I have purchased other brands and they have all been either hard or complete dust, these are large and fluffy pieces that can be easily broken down for my cats. These are by far their all time favorite treats so I usually reserve them for after nail clipping or grooming as rewards. They used to be AWFUL getting those sharp lil daggers cut but, now they actually line up for it...lol GREAT TREATS!
customer_reviews.author: Karen CTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Half bag is powder.
customer_reviews.text: My cat can only eat dehydrated treats. I tried this hoping to find it safer than other brand I've been buying. He loves it, but it was mailed in a bag, so it arrived half powder. I'm sure it was crushed in the mail. I can't afford to purchase this again. It's crazy to send this without a box to protect it. If I had not been sick, I would have asked for a return.
customer_reviews.author: December

customer_reviews.title: A lot of dust & my dog won't eat it!
customer_reviews.text: If I didnt know any better I would have thought I purchased the "sprinkles", because there was so much dust. Definitely not worth $16 plus dollars. Most definitely will not be purchasing again, and would return if the seller guaranteed their item. On top of that, my dog loves freeze dried chicken, but for some reason he snubs his nose at this. Wish I would have stuck with Pure Bites, at least I know my dog will eat it. 100% not happy, waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany_AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Gidget loves Cat-man-do chicken freeze dried
customer_reviews.text: Pop it in some water water. Let it soak it up. Remove cut into bites and watch you cat chow down. Its chicken. you could eat it if you needed to. If my cat could talk if my cat could jump up and down if my cat could write this review it would say this .. SO DELICIOUS MOM. BUT IT OFTEN PLEASE. MEOW GHANK LOVE GIDGET
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY LOVESamazon

customer_reviews.title: CAT LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this chicken. We give it to her between meals. She is diabetic and is also on a diet and seems to be hungry all the time. We take the freeze dried chicken and add water to it. We call it her chicken soup. It fills her up and is low carbs and calories plus give her extra water. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Mcdaniel

customer_reviews.title: Cats and Dogs' Favorite Treats
customer_reviews.text: My cats and dogs beg for these treats a few times a day. They stare at me crying non-stop until I finally give in. As soon as they hear the cabinet open the animals rush over jumping up and all around. As fast as I put their treats down they gobble them up. They all love these treats. I just wish they were less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: SaraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Your pet will love them
customer_reviews.text: Best freeze dried chicken on the.market.will only use this brand from now.on. there has been a lot of wastage with previous brands that I have used they are either too hard, very sharp pieces which can cut the animal's mouth and a lot of the.other brands are not fresh and disintegrate into powder.
customer_reviews.author: sweetpea123

customer_reviews.title: Our Cats' Choice
customer_reviews.text: Our two Siamese cats are very picky and will not eat cat treats that most cats love. However, both will eat this freeze dried chicken. They do not get it very often, so this has lasted us one year. If you give your cat treats daily, then it would probably last 3 - 6 months. The product does have a good bit of powder in it, but I use that to sprinkle on their canned cat food treat that they get each evening. One cat will only eat his now if it has this sprinkled on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Cat lured in from outside with these essential treats
customer_reviews.text: Love these treats. Have been buying them for years. 1) If my cat runs outside, or in a crawl space during renovation, just a quick shake of the bag brings her back. 2) She's older, so when she's feeling "off her food," I crumble some treats in and problem solved. 3) When she needs some exercise I toss the treats up the stairs or on top of a tree and she'll get extra running and climbing in.
customer_reviews.author: JasminTea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to crumble
customer_reviews.text: Love these... most of the time. What I like about these compared to other dehydrated chicken treats is that it can easily be crumbled. I like to crumble some into my dog’s food if he needs a little more incentive to eat. I like the big chunks as big rewards. Unfortunately the crumbliness means you get more powder than treat sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie H.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great treats for the times when my dog behaves as she should for me. I only use them for that, because they are pretty pricey and we go through them pretty fast as is. At the end of the bag, some of the pieces have broken down to near powder, so I pour some of these on top of her food.
customer_reviews.author: J Silvasy

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love these!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I mean really, really love them. One of our cats virtually demands them from us, a couple of times a day! We've bought through Amazon.com for quite a while, but recently the price increased considerably. We are now buying them through Chewy.com at a lower cost (more in line with what we've paid previously through Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: There are grrrreat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I ever did for my cat, or really me. This is all my cat ever wants. Cries 24/7 for it and is always waiting near the cabinet door for me to open it. This is only a treat Boris! Hardly eats his wet food, which he is suppose to, so I crumple it up and put it on top of his wet food. AS YOU CAN TELL IT IS A HIT IN MY HOME.
customer_reviews.author: Kenito

customer_reviews.title: 29 bags and still counting.  Must be good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2nd review. This was my 29th order so obviously my cat, Holly, who is almost 17 truly loves this product. I have to crush it to dust and then it's the first thing she eats when she gets up. The product is always consistent in it's quality so I will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: hlrideout

customer_reviews.title: My picky cat loves these
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these. Unfortunately, he thinks he should have them every 20 minutes or so. They're kinda pricey, but I'll keep buying them for my brat. He's very picky, but he loves these. I like that it only has chicken and none of the garbage that other treats have.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Neihart

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack......
customer_reviews.text: I should own stock in this company by now. My cat is addicted to these treats. I think they're good for cats who are on low carb diets due to crystals, or other issues, and you can soak them in water to get more fluid into your kitty. I literally have a paw on my arm waking me up at 3am for a quick "fix". She has me figured out, sweet licks and purrs, and then stare at the drawer until I relent. I wish they weren't so pricey, but it's worth it for the happy kitty I have begging for her "chicken cookie".
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Cat Loves!
customer_reviews.text: These are literally the only treats my cat will eat. I'm okay with spending the money on them because they're 100% chicken so better for her than those Temptations treats filled with junk. They do come with a lot of dust at the bottom because of shipping. Am just going to sprinkle it over her dry food when I get to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not chunks at all . But powder .
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this snack . Only hassle is it is all smashed to powder when it arrives . My babies can’t eat powder which goes up their nose and it’s not fair . 32$ isn’t exactly cheap . They are pricy for powder . They need to do better on they’re packaging .
customer_reviews.author: kavita

customer_reviews.title: Jackson Galaxy Knows Best
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these treats. They are a healthy alternative to the regular treats you find in the pet food aisle at the store. I don't give them to my cat right out of the bag. I wet them first, then pull the soft, large pieces into smaller bits which makes it easier for my toothless, senior cat to eat. I give them as a reward after he takes his medicine.
customer_reviews.author: m. barrett

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.  Large pieces.  Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My one cat absolutely loves this chicken. Some of the pieces are quite large and I have to break them up for her, but that's far better than other brands I've bought where half the bag was chicken dust. My other cat isn't interested in it, but the one who loves it, LOVES it. This brand is a great deal compared to ones I've bought in the pet store. I've already ordered this product twice and I'm planning to order some more right now. Unless my cat stops liking it, for some strange reason, I will keep buying it!
customer_reviews.author: peekooz

customer_reviews.title: Unenthusiastic Reaction From My Cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats are very "meh" about these. They (all 3) have a very strong preference towards the salmon and shrimp ones, and will nibble on these but show very little enthusiasm for them. Probably better for dogs than cats.
customer_reviews.author: MovieGuyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: My cats are addicted... wish they came in a slightly less bulk version
customer_reviews.text: My cats are addicted to these. They love Bonita flakes too, and seem to flock to these as well. One issue a wish they were not such big chunks. I end up breaking them up. But it works! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: A4Q96

customer_reviews.title: Cats like them
customer_reviews.text: I like the bulk package, like the ingredients but it does crumble a bit - just get a sealed container or keep in freezer.
customer_reviews.author: intel99

customer_reviews.title: Best healthy treat out there! That’s what our dog says!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog LOVES this for her treats. She will do more tricks for this then any other treat out there. Sometimes we will sprinkle a few pieces over her food. Great for dogs that have teeth issues because it almost dissolves when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica West

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the freeze dried chicken. I feed ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the freeze dried chicken. I feed him all freeze dried products because I don't find added extras! A bonus when you are concerned what your dog is eating.
customer_reviews.author: Devi B Greer

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack
customer_reviews.text: I can convince my cat to do anything with this stuff. Single ingredient and no junk. Appreciate the fast shipping from the seller because I always forget to order until we're at critical mass.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Always have this on hand. Our kitties love this stuff. I reconstitute it by putting some in a small dish, pouring very warm water over it, and setting a timer for 15 minutes. I make enough for several days, keeping it in the 'fridge after rehydrating it, in a baggie. My only complaint is that sometimes there are a lot of crumbled pieces in a bag, especially if it comes in a box with other products.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Always a favorite
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. They recognize the sound of the packet and come running. As a catxowner, I like that it's chicken and nothing but chicken. I can give it to them in good conscience.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hilles

customer_reviews.title: Best  Cat.Treat Ever
customer_reviews.text: My two cats will ignore any other food and their toys for a freeze dried chicken treat. You can rehydrate them but my cats like them dry. These are not a complete diet for cats, so you need to convince your cat to eat a other food as well. Your cat(s) eat them dry you need to provide plenty of water. The treats are a bit fragile so I recommend buying them from a seller that will box them instead of sending them in a mailing envelope. I've had two shipments that were in bad shape because they weren't boxed.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bride

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this! Some of the pieces are big for a cat but I just cut or break them. The pieces are firm and not too crumbly. I also sprinkle the powder over his food if he's being picky and it encourages him to eat more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky Savannah Cat LOVES IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: 12 week old savannah that's only been fed raw food LOVES this stuff!! I couldn't get him to eat anything unless it was raw until I got this stuff.. Crumbles right up, perfect treat or to mix. Wish it was a big cheaper though. You don't get much.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ely

customer_reviews.title: These treats have gone bad
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product for years from different vendors and it always has a sticker with a use by date... When I received this produce there was no use by date... Then I opened the package and the smell was horrible.. There’s no way I feeding this to my pet.. I can’t nelieve this would be sold...
customer_reviews.author: BuzzkillRomantic

customer_reviews.title: Didnt ship too well
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this higher, but about 1/3 of the package is powder! The rest of the package is good. I think it would have been all good, but apparently it wasnt packaged as well as it could have been. :( One of the other boxes slid into this package and broke/crumbled/mashed an entire side of the dried chicken treats. I think this could have been prevented if it were packaged either shipped alone or wrapped in bubble wrap that held up through shipping. The remainder of the package is great and the furkids are loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybird

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cats
customer_reviews.text: My cats both love these treats. The quality is consistent and they have zero complaints about the flavor. I see other reviews make mention of the ground up powder you get at the bottom of the bag, but I find this to be the case with all treats. I just save it to sprinkle over their kibble, which then just makes the kibble feel like a treat to them too. Nothing's wasted, and I really wouldn't change it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: Our cat stops killing everything in sight outside when she has this chicken. I think it is because it fulfills her need for protein. A must for any cat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality freeze-dried chicken for feeding or treats
customer_reviews.text: I use freeze-dried chicken cat treats to supplement my cats' diet. As cats age, additional protein helps to keep them in good shape. I crumble several pieces on their food. I had started with another brand, and my supplier switched to this brand, which I like very much. This is human grade chicken breast that has been cooked, diced and freeze-dried. it is in a resealable pouch. I had not been aware that Cat Man Doo (which I am familiar with from its freeze-dried bonito flakes) was the manufacturer. Based on the excellence of the product, I am not surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but chicken.
customer_reviews.text: The beasts are besides themselves when I open this package. Every time. Their eyes shine, and so are the coats. Happiness all around (except for the chickens).
customer_reviews.author: TBW

customer_reviews.title: Well Loved!
customer_reviews.text: When I grab the bag I immediately have a furry buddy. My cat LOVES these and is working out ways to farm more from me (and achieving it -sigh-)
customer_reviews.author: Cl

customer_reviews.title: Kitty addictive
customer_reviews.text: My kitties are addicted to this wonderful treat. Just chicken. They love it. We have a treat ritual every evening before bedtime. A special treat that's good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Package damanged
customer_reviews.text: Item came opened (a slit on the front of the package!) so I won’t be giving them to my dogs, I don’t feel like they are safe since I’m not sure how long they were opened
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: I have one cat that will eat this almost instead of anything else and another who sees it as a treat. Kinda expensive but healthier than other treats.
customer_reviews.author: CLPhx2KC

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't get enough!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loooooves these treats. I affectionately call it "crack chicken" as my dog will do ANYTHING for these treats. After a friend offered these treats to my dog -- I've taught my dog so many tricks. The one thing I wasn't a fan of - was how "chalky" it is (compared to the store bought one). This might be a result of the fragile chicken treats being shooken and handled during transportation, creating the dustiness.
customer_reviews.author: Etch-a-sketch

customer_reviews.title: Cats love the taste..greenies suck
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves these sucked but after time w moving the bag around u will get crumbs at bottom..put an in like n feed them cats
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Kitty gives 5 star rating!!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty goes crazy for these. They are only natural freeze dried chicken with no unhealthy additives.
customer_reviews.author: Angel S.

customer_reviews.title: Cats don't like these
customer_reviews.text: My cats typically really like dehydrated chicken treats, but for some reason they don't like these. These are much harder than the pet store variety. Maybe that's why?
customer_reviews.author: J. Perrigoue

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 cats..
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 cats love these.. at least in my house. My eldest cat doesn't like them. She has a temperamental stomach so it is probably best that she doesn't eat them anyway. My other cats love them, I use them with AïKiou Stimulo Cat Interactive Feeder, Grey/Green, which works very well since the treats are really light and they just use their claws to pull them out. These treats can crumble and break, which is good because some pieces are larger but bad because they leave dusty crumbs behind.
customer_reviews.author: brandeebelle

customer_reviews.title: My kittys favorite
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is about 7 months old and hes sooo picky I have a very hard time finding him food he will eat. He loves these!! Its the one food he consistently likes everytime. The only downfall is freeze dried chicken is expensive and Catmandoo is just as expensive as other brands but my kitty likes it so it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: kevin m

customer_reviews.title: Kitty crack
customer_reviews.text: My cats are obsessed with this! It’s a great treat and it helped absorb some of the liquid meds I had to feed my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Denio Johnson

customer_reviews.title: my cats love these treats
customer_reviews.text: i found a company that is half the price ,,,if i get it under the dog category,,,makes it so much better for me,,,i can order them more often,,,you should lower the price
customer_reviews.author: michelle hansen

customer_reviews.title: BEST TREATS EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog and cat, and they both love it. My cat is obsessed with it. You can feed it as a treat, or put it over their food which makes them chow it down fast. It’s definitely healthier than other treats that contain unwanted preservatives, so it’s a great alternative. Cats are obsessed over this and go crazy whenever they hear the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Stale again
customer_reviews.text: Our cats used to love this. Lately the product smells stale and they won't touch it. Just found out the seller doesn't do refunds. Will have to find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lunaray

customer_reviews.title: Cat Crack in a bag!
customer_reviews.text: No joke, this stuff is "cat-crack" in a bag! The only thing I can say about it, is this: My cat goes absolutely INSANE over this stuff. Never seen my cat go this bonkers over a "treat". She loves her treats, but, this product gives a whole new meaning to "cat treat". As soon as I reach for the bag her eyes get all huge, her ears go back, she starts flippin' out....kinda funny to watch. I swear, there's more than just "freeze-dried chicken" in this bag. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Laney50w

customer_reviews.title: I love CATMANDOO cat treats and so do my cats
customer_reviews.text: I love CATMANDOO cat treats and so do my cats. I usually order the Salmon treats but decided to try these Chicken treats for a little variety... OMG I had no idea how crazy my cats would go for these bite sized nuggets. They beg for them each morning and can not wait to get to them. I will definitely buy these over and over again. Thanks CATMANDOO for making such healthy treats for my furbabies!
customer_reviews.author: Heather A

customer_reviews.title: Finally freeze dried chicken treats that are fresh and all white meat
customer_reviews.text: I finally found freeze dried chicken treats that are fresh, all white meat, made in the USA and my 3 little dogs love. Many freeze dried chicken dog treats now seem to come with rancid peaces or mostly crumbs. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy treat!!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 year old ckd cat loves these!! I warm it first with water to make it easier for her to eat. Dog loves it too.worth the money
customer_reviews.author: super reader

customer_reviews.title: great food additive or snack
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. I add a little to their wet food and sometimes just give it to them as a treet. They scarf it up!
customer_reviews.author: Penny A. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: my cat is 18 years old and barely eating. ...
customer_reviews.text: my cat is 18 years old and barely eating. he will however eat this when you just crunch it to powder with your fingers and then sprinkle it on some wet food. it gives at least a little protein when he's eating so little.
customer_reviews.author: christian puchkoris

customer_reviews.title: Best treats fir cats and dogs
customer_reviews.text: These are the best freeze dried chicken treats for cats and dogs and I have tried them all
customer_reviews.author: E. Arquette

customer_reviews.title: This made my cats happy to eat poultry!
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats doesn’t like poultry as well as fish, but like to alternate for nutrient variety. If I crush one of these on the cats’ chicken or turkey food, they love it and eat it happily. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jabberwock

customer_reviews.title: Such a Quality Pet Treat
customer_reviews.text: I'm my dog's and cat's best friend when I take these out for training and treats! The pieces are bigger, yet still breakable, than other brands I've tried, and there isn't as much "powder" at the bottom of the bag as other brands. The bonus for me is that whenever I need the animals to come to me, I crinkle the bag and they come running! Our cat is an indoor cat, but is an escape artist. When he runs out, I crinkle the bag, and back he comes!
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyside

customer_reviews.title: We were happy to buy these online as the quantity is greater ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves the freeze dried chicken we buy at the pet store. We were happy to buy these online as the quantity is greater and the price a lot more reasonable. Every time we open this bag our cat goes nuts over these and always makes a beeline to his food dish. We jokingly refer to these snacks as “kitty crack”; they really are addictive to cats!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken up really powdered
customer_reviews.text: I would like it replaced since I can’t return, half of it was powder, this has happened before and would like a replacement please
customer_reviews.author: Annette Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE these and eat a ton of them. Safe and healthy treat for my two cats. Sometimes I receive bags with a lot of tiny pieces at the bottom but use those to sprinkle on top of their wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Love
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves loves loves this. I crumble it, just one piece at a time....thus it lasts..... onto his wet or dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Daisey Love

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  My cat LOVES it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this product. "Wanna treat?" and she comes running, fast. Nice. Nothing but white meat chicken, dehydrated. Fantastic. But KEEP A CLEAN BOWL OF FRESH WATER available at all times for your cat (or dog). This product in this quantity is less expensive than other smaller packaged other brands.
customer_reviews.author: dl8ch

customer_reviews.title: Saving our elderly cat's life!
customer_reviews.text: Our 15-year-old cat has diabetes and kidney disease, and has lost a lot of weight in the last year. Getting him to eat is increasingly challenging -- but not when we have this freeze-dried chicken on hand! We crumble it on top of his food and he eats the whole bowl, quite an accomplishment. I visited numerous local pet supply stores and didn't find these on hand; the other brands didn't look as white and high-quality. So I'm happy to buy Life Essentials online.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Powers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this. Worth the money! Goes on top of their wet food which encourages them to eat!
customer_reviews.author: peachmom

customer_reviews.title: My cat and dog love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats and dog love this, however I didn’t give it five stars because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Flying Girl

customer_reviews.title: Pets love these
customer_reviews.text: My dog and cats love these - more than any other treats! Wish they cost a little less...
customer_reviews.author: Nancy P

customer_reviews.title: My cats love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My cats love these treats; I break them into smaller pieces, and sprinkle them over the bowls of wet food for an extra bonus for my cats. Also worked really well to convince my cat to eat again after being sick for a day and a half; I think it jump-started his appetite very effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Friedberg

customer_reviews.title: My dog goes crazy for this.
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it! The only thing I don’t like it the large amount of powder and tiny pieces left at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both my dog and my cat are addicted to the Chicken and the Salmon. We can NEVER run out!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Haddox

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My cat enjoys these as treats and I enjoy knowing I'm giving her something good for her. Since freeze dried treats can be expensive, I always search for the best value before purchasing and I keep returning to this brand. The price is great when you compare the price per ounce to other brands. I also appreciate the resealable bag this one offers. Deducting one star because the bag sometimes contains a lot of dust from broken chicken strips.
customer_reviews.author: GorgonGirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite dried chicken treat. What I like about it is it softer and less gristle. I can break them apart easier and I have one cat that will not eat the tough ones. There are some harder pieces but the other cat eats anything. All and all my favorite brand and we’ve tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vawter

customer_reviews.title: A little on the expensive side, but it's a great quality product and my cats all LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: A little on the expensive side, but it's a great quality product and my cats all LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ghostie Cats

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love these. We love giving them treats made of pure ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Kismetmiao

customer_reviews.title: All cats seem to love it
customer_reviews.text: I gently rub it between thumb and forefinger this break it up into dust. The cats lap it up like there’s no tomorrow. I also have a cat with no teeth and this method of serving the treat is easy for her to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Allred

customer_reviews.title: Best treats ever!
customer_reviews.text: My cat and dog drool over this treat! It's made with 1 ingredient, chicken. No chemicals, addictives, or garbage ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: dianap95

customer_reviews.title: All chicken no preservatives
customer_reviews.text: Candy for pets we sprinkle it on the dry food and use it for treats. Dobby is addicted to it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Give Us More!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this stuff. I wanted to get my cats off of dry food and eating canned food. I had one that was a total carbo-holic and would not eat the wet food. Mix a bit of Cat Man Doo freeze dried chicken in and she is wolfing it down! All 4 of the cats go crazy for this stuff. I mix some in all of their food 4 times a day. A bag lasts about 3 weeks. I just ordered 2 more bags. No more leftover food. Plates are licked clean in no time, and everyone is happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N

customer_reviews.title: The girls love it!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love this! It's a treat, not a meal that you rehydrate. My 20 year old with only half her teeth still loves to chomp down on this crunchy treat. I'm really picky about what they get so this works well for us. (Someone said their cats got sick. I find that odd. My cats have eaten the Life Essentials Freeze Dried Treats for years, both in chicken and salmon. Never a problem.)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I love it because it has no smell and is just ...
customer_reviews.text: One cat is diabetic and is to eat very few grains or carbs. This is a healthy treat for him and he will eat it when nothing else is appealing. I love it because it has no smell and is just such a clean and perfect food.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves these things!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES these treats. They can be a little messy because of the tiny crumbs left behind after my cat gobbles them up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cat loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, and the picky eater is the one who loves these. Pricey but worth it. These are healthy US made treats.
customer_reviews.author: aqua2711

customer_reviews.title: Two ordered-One good-one stale and unedible
customer_reviews.text: My cat has always loved this product. This is the first time I bought it online. One of the bags is stale and so the pieces don't soften in the mouth. My cat wouldn't eat a singleone in the bag. The second vag that I ordered at the same time was fine and my cat is happy. I just wish I had been able to use both purchased bag of treats.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Wombat

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the dried chicken very much. Our cat loves it and we are happy it is not filled with carbohydrates. There is just meat which is the best for cats as they are obligate carnivores. We will purchase this again. We even showed our veterinarian and he said it was a very good treat for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Mafalda Martin

customer_reviews.title: All Natural High Protein Treat
customer_reviews.text: My cats love,love this high protein, all chicken treat; I crush a chicken morsel and sprinkle it as a condiment over their wet food. They eat every bite! I also give them as treats. As soon as I open the treat jar they are all meowing for their share. Great all natural treat for your pets, dog or cat.
customer_reviews.author: mary j lanigan

customer_reviews.title: Great freeze-dried food.
customer_reviews.text: We add it to chicken broth, then heat up and put into our dogs' food. They LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Lkimba75

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product. Thank u for shipping it so it wasn’t all smashed up in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: darcy taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff! It's great as treats and perfect crumbled over the food of fussy kitties!
customer_reviews.author: Ayame

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is apparently crack for kitties. My cat even so much as sees the bag and she starts to meow and her tail swishes and she’s all over me, purring. She’s clearly a cheap date, even for a 20.5 lb Maine Coon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: Bigger slices and less dust at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: My cats (especially my 4 year old ginger) LOVE THESE FREEZE DRIED CHICKEN TREATS! Actually my cat is obsessed with them. I like the bigger slices; I don’t know if there’s anything you can do but as I get to the end of a bag, all the freeze dried chicken has become tiny bits and pieces and literally dust. I guess the pieces might be getting crushed somehow but if there’s any way to remedy that I’d love it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise de la Vaux

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this stuff! And there are no concerns about what is in the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blind

customer_reviews.title: Cat walked away
customer_reviews.text: No interest in product. I found it to be a strange texture.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Codder

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: It's like doggie drugs. They love it. Kind of expensive but a great product.
customer_reviews.author: passionate about cooking

product_meta.title: LIFE ESSENTIALS By Cat-Man-Doo All Natural Freeze Dried Chicken For Dogs & Cats - No Fillers, Preservatives, or Additives -- Grain Free Tasty Treat -- 5 Oz Bag -- Made in USA
feature_bullets: Natural Dog Treats Goodness - No fillers, preservatives or harmful ingredients. Know what your dog is eating with our 100% Freeze Dried Chicken Treats
True Pet Lovers - A favorite Among Cats & Dogs Everywhere! Use as a Treat or as a Food Topper over Your Pets Dry Kibble!
Single Ingredient Grain Free - It is low in fat, calories and carbohydrates so it won’t contribute to weight gain
Made in U S A - You can feel great each time you reward your treasured four-legged family member with Life Essentials Freeze Dried Chicken. Proudly Made in the USA, & FDA Inspected.
Healthy Pet Diet - Supports Better Health For Your Pet With Improved Appetite And Digestion, Relief From Allergies, Shiny Skin And Coat, Increased Energy & Stamina, And Healthy Immune System
